item.title: Handling Invalid Hook Call warning
item.description: The “Invalid Hook Call Warning” sometimes pops up when developing with React. If you follow React’s docs on the subject and it isn’t resolved and you’re seeing this warning when running your tests. First verify that react and react-dom are the same version and that there is only one version installed as the docs say. If you still see this during your tests, check the version of react-test-renderer and make sure it matches your version of react.
